Kabuto (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0139: Omastar
Pokémon
#0141: Kabutops →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Kabuto (TCG Pocket).

Kabuto has been featured on 13 different cards since it debuted in the Fossil expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Kabuto cards are normally Fighting-type or Water-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Kabuto

Kabuto
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English
Expansion 		Rarity # Japanese
Expansion 		Rarity #
Kabuto Fossil 50/62 Mystery of the Fossils  
Legendary Collection 48/110        
Kabuto         Expansion Sheet 2  
Kabuto Neo Discovery 56/75 Crossing the Ruins...  
Kabuto Skyridge 37/144 Split Earth 056/088
Kabuto EX Sandstorm 39/100 Magma VS Aqua: Two Ambitions 025/080
Kabuto EX Legend Maker 36/92 Mirage Forest 053/086
Kabuto δ EX Holon Phantoms 67/110 Holon Phantom 020/052
Kabuto EX Power Keepers 51/108 World Champions Pack 046/108
Kabuto Majestic Dawn 67/100 Dawn Dash  
Kabuto Arceus 67/99 Advent of Arceus 049/090
Kabuto Fates Collide 38/124 Awakening Psychic King 033/078
Kabuto Team Up 77/181 Tag Bolt 058/095
Kabuto 151 140/165 Pokémon Card 151 140/165


This article is part of Project TCG, a Bulbapedia project that aims to report on every aspect of the Pokémon Trading Card Game.
